name:name: # ^ This file demonstrates THREE v0.10.0 / v0.11.0 features together:
# ^    bossLevel and bossHp are moved here from the expansion manifest,
# ^    showing that complex or numerous custom types can live in a dedicated TSV file.
# ^    EliteBossStats extends FlexStats (from core CoreTypes.tsv) and redeclares
# ^    critRate:float|nil as critRate:float, making crit rate MANDATORY for elite bosses.
# ^    BossStats extends FlexStats and redeclares critRate:float|nil as critRate:nil,
# ^    permanently marking the field as unused (bosses fight differently; no crit mechanic).
bossLevel
description:text: Boss level range (extends core 'level', restricts to min 50)

name:name: bossHp
validate:string|nil: value >= 1000 or 'boss HP must be at least 1000'
description:text: Boss hit points (extends core 'hitPoints', expression validator)

name:name: BossStats
description:text: Standard boss stats: inherits FlexStats fields, adds enrageThreshold, marks critRate as UNUSED (column omission)

name:name: EliteBossStats
description:text: Elite boss stats: inherits FlexStats fields, adds enrageThreshold, narrows critRate from float|nil to mandatory float (column redefinition)
